comments: I almost didn\'t take her class b/c some comments about her attitude. Maybe she does but if she hadn\'t told me I had to get it together and that I was totally capable of getting it done, I probably would have failed or dropped, just like other classes. She was the first teacher to tell me I was smart and it wasn\'t just bs teacher talk.

comments: Took this class during Early Spring, didn\'t want to take this class because of my fear of public speaking, but Debbie gave great tips on how to not be scared and how to control your nerves! I learned so much, she will teach you how to give great speeches! She does snap once in a while, but that\'s just how she is! I hope you enjoy her class!

comments: Took class in early spring. Entire class done in 2 1/2 wks - freakin\' nutz. Teacher didn\'t make it easier just b/c it was a slam session, but did reply to my emails even on wkends when I needed help. Most teachers don\'t do that. If someone had a problem w/ her I\'m guessing they thought she\'d go easy since it was a tight schedule.

comments: She is a good speech teacher but I just don\'t like her attitude. During speeches I would look at her and she would roll her eyes at the students presenting if they made a slight mistake. That\'s not very professional. You are there to teach us not roll your eyes at us. So glad that class is over with! Good luck to anyone that takes her class.

comments: Please take her class. I heard the other teachers do not even grade fairly, but Debbie does. Your grade is the effort you put in the class, so if you want an A and really show it, you\'ll get an A. She gives a lot of feedback and helps us to become better speakers. Shell occasionally crack a joke, but overall she was a very nice/easy teacher!!!!

comments: I did early spring with her and it\'s the most stressful thing ever but it\'s a good stress. She really changes you as a presenter. I feared public speaking as if it were death but now I\'m not afraid anymore. She\'s a great instructor and very clear on what she expects From you . She\'s tough but highly recommend her.

tag_professor: Participation matters (11)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (9)  Clear grading criteria (6)  Gives good feedback (5)  Tough Grader (4)  Caring (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Respected (1)
comments: I\'m not sure what constitutes a good speech teacher, but she does make you get up in front of the class and give five or six speeches over the course of the semester. This allows you to get more comfortable with being in the spotlight and talking, which really helped my public speaking skills (and hopefully your\'s as well).

tag_professor: Participation matters (11)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (9)  Clear grading criteria (6)  Gives good feedback (5)  Tough Grader (4)  Caring (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Respected (1)
stu_tags: PARTICIPATION MATTERS  CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA  RESPECTED
comments: Loved Ms Sturt. She is very confident and knows what she\'s talking about. Public speaking can be really scary for some people, but she definitely knows this and grades you accordingly. She is very clear with what she wants from you and is very clear the grading your speeches. Definitely the professor to take public speaking from.

tag_professor: Participation matters (11)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (9)  Clear grading criteria (6)  Gives good feedback (5)  Tough Grader (4)  Caring (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Debbie Sturt is a great and experienced instructor, as long as you do your job as a student no mater if English is your 1st or 2nd language, you will pass and get an A. If you won\'t do your job and would not listen to her during lectures, it is better to not take any class, especially Debbie\'s class, if you are not good student.

tag_professor: Participation matters (11)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (9)  Clear grading criteria (6)  Gives good feedback (5)  Tough Grader (4)  Caring (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Respected (1)
comments: The readings and homework assignments are easy and clear. Attendence is key, even though she can be late sometimes. It\'s a very easy class, but she can be sarcastic and rude at times. She makes her students feel stupid. Overall, would not take her again.

comments: She is strict, but c\'mon its College! Do your part and you will pass! She is pretty real, and doesn\'t BS around.

tag_professor: Participation matters (11)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (9)  Clear grading criteria (6)  Gives good feedback (5)  Tough Grader (4)  Caring (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Respected (1)

comments: I thought that the class was going to be really hard, but turns out, it was a piece of cake! if you are on her good side, then it will go by fast, and be sure to do every single assignment that she gives you or else your grade will drop, especially presentations! Don\'t do a presentation, and your grade drops gradually! overall, I enjoyed it!

tag_professor: Participation matters (11)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (9)  Clear grading criteria (6)  Gives good feedback (5)  Tough Grader (4)  Caring (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Extremely clear with expectations, just show up and do the assignments and you\'ll get an A. One of the more fun and easy classes I\'ve taken at MPC.

tag_professor: Participation matters (11)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (9)  Clear grading criteria (6)  Gives good feedback (5)  Tough Grader (4)  Caring (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Great instructor, good sense of humor. Gives lots of real-life examples of what not to say and why. Explained things very well. Very fair. Allows you to submit assignments via email. Very interesting class.

tag_professor: Participation matters (11)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (9)  Clear grading criteria (6)  Gives good feedback (5)  Tough Grader (4)  Caring (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Respected (1)
comments: She is a great teacher! Super engaging! You can tell that she loves what she does and the enthusiasm is contagious. She does expect you to do the work but she also is understanding when things come up. If you are up front and honest with her she will try her best to help you succeed. Always willing to help students! Great Prof, I learned a ton!

tag_professor: Participation matters (11)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (9)  Clear grading criteria (6)  Gives good feedback (5)  Tough Grader (4)  Caring (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Respected (1)
comments: She was extremely clear and consistent with her class and assignment expectations. I felt distant from her, probably resulting from missing her class four times. I really liked the class though because the speeches informed me on various topics around the world such as health, sales, sports, etc. I recommend her. All you need to do is the work!
